paper_abstract: Binary sequences with low autocorrelation have important applications in communication systems and cryptography. In this paper, the autocorrelation values of binary Whiteman generalized cyclotomic sequences of order six and period pq are discussed. Our result shows that the autocorrelation of these sequences is four-valued and that the corresponding values are in {-1, 3, -5, pq} if the parameters are chosen carefully.
paper_title: Autocorrelation Values of Generalized Cyclotomic Sequences of Order Six
